title: The Great Gatsby
short_description: A classic novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
long_description: The Great Gatsby is a story about the wealthy Jay Gatsby and his tragic love for Daisy Buchanan, set in the Roaring Twenties.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
short_description: A novel about racial injustice in the Deep South.
long_description: Written by Harper Lee, the novel follows Scout Finch as she grows up in a town plagued by racial discrimination, guided by her father, Atticus Finch.
